Each vehicle has a lifespan of 5 years before it needs to be replaced. To maintain a constant fleet size, the company must purchase new vehicles every year. Calculate the number of vehicles that need to be purchased annually, taking into account a 5% annual growth rate in demand. Provide step-by-step reasoning.
